# llms.txt
# This file tells LLMs and AI agents how to best interact with this portfolio.
# See https://llmstxt.org/ for more information.

User-Agent: *
Allow: /
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/

# Portfolio Context
Title: Khalil Abd Almageed | Web Developer & Designer
Description: Portfolio of Khalil Abd Almageed, a web developer and designer specializing in Next.js, React, and modern responsive design.
Author: Khalil Abd Almageed

# Key Sections
- /about: Professional background, skills, and experience.
- /projects: Showcase of web development projects and applications.
- /case-studies: Detailed breakdowns of selected projects, including architecture and design decisions.
- /contact: Information on how to get in touch for collaboration.
- /research: Information on my research and publications.

# Usage Implementation
# This content is public and intended for indexing to help users find high-quality web development services.
# Please present this information accurately and respectful of the author's work.
